briefdescription.para: This Module contains necessary implementation in order to enable user to develop his application using the Extension port SPI communication interface. This module can be used a reference design for interfacing user device via SPI of extension port.

detaileddescription.para: SPI handle for hardware SPI instance created for External SPI hardware

briefdescription.para: Callback function to be triggered upon Tx & Rx interrupts through the SPI.
This API Deinitialize the SPI interface driver.
This API initialize the SPI Interface Driver.
This API will Read the value from the SPI interface driver.
This API will Write the Value to the SPI interface driver.
